item.title: Programms
item.description: Factorial <?php $number = 6; /*number to get factorial */ $fact = 1; for($k=1;$k<=$number;++$k) { $fact = $fact*$k; } echo "Factorial of $number is ".$fact; ?> Fibonacci <?PHP $first = 0; $second = 1; echo $first.'&nbsp;,'; echo $second.'&nbsp;,'; for($limit=0;$limit<10;$limit++) { $third = $first+$second; echo $third.'&nbsp;,';; $first = $second; $second = $third; } ?> Amstrong <?php $number = $_POST[ 'number' ]; // get the number entered by user $temp = $number; $sum = 0; while($temp !
